verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* king rejoices \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* strength, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! How greatly \w he|strong="H1732"\w* rejoices \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* salvation!

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H8055"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* heartâ€™s desire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not withheld \w the|strong="H3068"\w* request \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* lips. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* meet \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* blessings \w of|strong="H3820"\w* goodness. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3820"\w* fine gold \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* head.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* asked life \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* gave \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H2896"\w* \w him|strong="H7896"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* length \w of|strong="H7218"\w* days forever \w and|strong="H7218"\w* ever.

\w His|strong="H5414"\w* glory \w is|strong="H3117"\w* great \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* salvation. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* honor \w and|strong="H3117"\w* majesty \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H7737"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* most blessed forever. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H7737"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* glad \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* loving kindness \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Most|strong="H1293"\w* High, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* moved.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* find out \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies. \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3068"\w* find out \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fiery furnace \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* anger. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* swallow \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* devour \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* descendants \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* posterity \w from|strong="H6440"\w* among \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.
\w For|strong="H1121"\w* they intended evil against \w you|strong="H2233"\w*. They plotted evil against \w you|strong="H2233"\w* which cannot succeed.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* \w make|strong="H2803"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H5186"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* aim drawn bows \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* face.

\w Be|strong="H6440"\w* exalted, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* strength, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* sing \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H3559"\w*.
